name: Lava Child
immunities: fire; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from metal weapons

traits.name: Heated Body
traits.desc: A creature that touches the lava child or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 ft. of it takes 7 (2d6) fire damage.

traits.name: Metal Immunity
traits.desc: Lava children are unaffected by metal. They can walk through solid metal doors as if the door wasn’t there. Metal weapons, even magical, have no effect on lava children. Lava children make all attacks with advantage against foes wearing metal armor.

traits.name: Water Vulnerability
traits.desc: For every 1 gallon of water splashed on the lava child, it takes 3 cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lava child makes one bite attack and one attack with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.
